languages.text: "Да. Дрессура и аугментации гарантируют, что Глейто будет принимать только те приказы, что исходят от меня или вышестоящего по чину. Кроме очевидных достоинств, это препятствует неразберихе, когда в миссии участвуют несколько Арбитес с кибермастифами".

"Correct. Both his training and his augmetics ensure that Glaito only accepts orders from me or from my superior officers. Apart from having the obvious benefits, it also serves to prevent disarray on missions involving multiple cyber-mastiff handlers."
languages.original_text: "Да. Дрессура и аугментации гарантируют, что Глейто будет принимать только те приказы, что исходят от меня или вышестоящего по чину. Кроме очевидных достоинств, это препятствует неразберихе, когда в миссии участвуют несколько Арбитес с кибермастифами".

"Correct. Both his training and his augmetics ensure that Glaito only accepts orders from me or from my superior officers. Apart from having the obvious benefits, it also serves to prevent disarray on missions involving multiple cyber-mastiff handlers."

languages.text: 「そのとおりです。グライトは、訓練とオーグメティックの両方によって、私と私の上官からの命令しか受け付けないようになっています。この仕組みには明白な利点があるだけでなく、複数のサイバーマスチフ使いが関わる任務での混乱を防ぐという役割もあります」
languages.original_text: "Correct. Both his training and his augmetics ensure that Glaito only accepts orders from me or from my superior officers. Apart from having the obvious benefits, it also serves to prevent disarray on missions involving multiple cyber-mastiff handlers."

traits.locale_text: 「そのとおりです。グライトは、訓練とオーグメティックの両方によって、私と私の上官からの命令しか受け付けないようになっています。この仕組みには明白な利点があるだけでなく、複数のサイバーマスチフ使いが関わる任務での混乱を防ぐという役割もあります」

languages.text: "Korrekt. Sowohl sein Training als auch seine Augmentationen sorgen dafür, dass Glaito nur von mir oder meinen vorgesetzten Offizieren Befehle annimmt. Neben den offensichtlichen Vorteilen verhindert das auch Chaos bei Missionen mit mehreren Cyber-Mastiffs und ihren Herren."
languages.original_text: "Correct. Both his training and his augmetics ensure that Glaito only accepts orders from me or from my superior officers. Apart from having the obvious benefits, it also serves to prevent disarray on missions involving multiple cyber-mastiff handlers."

traits.locale_text: "Korrekt. Sowohl sein Training als auch seine Augmentationen sorgen dafür, dass Glaito nur von mir oder meinen vorgesetzten Offizieren Befehle annimmt. Neben den offensichtlichen Vorteilen verhindert das auch Chaos bei Missionen mit mehreren Cyber-Mastiffs und ihren Herren."

languages.text: « Tout à fait. Grâce à son dressage et ses augmétiques, Glaito obéit uniquement à mes ordres ou à ceux de mes supérieurs. De plus, ce système permet d'éviter toute confusion lors des missions recourant à plusieurs cyber-mastiffs. »
languages.original_text: "Correct. Both his training and his augmetics ensure that Glaito only accepts orders from me or from my superior officers. Apart from having the obvious benefits, it also serves to prevent disarray on missions involving multiple cyber-mastiff handlers."

traits.locale_text: « Tout à fait. Grâce à son dressage et ses augmétiques, Glaito obéit uniquement à mes ordres ou à ceux de mes supérieurs. De plus, ce système permet d'éviter toute confusion lors des missions recourant à plusieurs cyber-mastiffs. »

languages.text: «Correcto. Tanto su adiestramiento como sus auméticos garantizan que Glaito únicamente acepte órdenes mías o de mis oficiales superiores. Aparte de las evidentes ventajas que ello conlleva, también contribuye a evitar confusiones cuando varios agentes con cibermastines colaboran en una misión».
languages.original_text: "Correct. Both his training and his augmetics ensure that Glaito only accepts orders from me or from my superior officers. Apart from having the obvious benefits, it also serves to prevent disarray on missions involving multiple cyber-mastiff handlers."

traits.locale_text: «Correcto. Tanto su adiestramiento como sus auméticos garantizan que Glaito únicamente acepte órdenes mías o de mis oficiales superiores. Aparte de las evidentes ventajas que ello conlleva, también contribuye a evitar confusiones cuando varios agentes con cibermastines colaboran en una misión».

languages.text: “正是如此。格雷托被植入了各种各样的植入物，还接受了合适的训练，确保它只会听命于我或我的上级军官。这么做除了明显的好处之外，还可以在涉及多只生化獒犬的行动期间，防止指挥系统发生混乱。”
languages.original_text: "Correct. Both his training and his augmetics ensure that Glaito only accepts orders from me or from my superior officers. Apart from having the obvious benefits, it also serves to prevent disarray on missions involving multiple cyber-mastiff handlers."

traits.locale_text: “正是如此。格雷托被植入了各种各样的植入物，还接受了合适的训练，确保它只会听命于我或我的上级军官。这么做除了明显的好处之外，还可以在涉及多只生化獒犬的行动期间，防止指挥系统发生混乱。”

languages.text: "Evet. Glaito'nun hem eğitimi hem de ogmetikleri yalnızca benden veya üstlerimden emir almasına müsaade ediyor. Bu, bariz faydalarının yanı sıra birden fazla siber mastif bakıcısının bulunduğu görevlerde kargaşayı da önlüyor."
languages.original_text: "Correct. Both his training and his augmetics ensure that Glaito only accepts orders from me or from my superior officers. Apart from having the obvious benefits, it also serves to prevent disarray on missions involving multiple cyber-mastiff handlers."

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Glaito'nun hem eğitimi hem de ogmetikleri yalnızca benden veya üstlerimden emir almasına müsaade ediyor. Bariz faydalarının yanı sıra birden fazla siber mastif bakıcısının bulunduğu görevlerde kargaşayı da önler."

languages.original_text: "Correct. Both his training and his augmetics ensure that Glaito only accepts orders from me or from my superior officers. Apart from having the obvious benefits, it also serves to prevent disarray on missions involving multiple cyber-mastiff handlers."
